task: Find a quick and easy chicken stir-fry recipe with a cooking time of under 30 minutes on Allrecipes.

steps.2: Type 'quick chicken stir-fry' in the search bar and press Enter.
steps.3: Filter the results by selecting '30 minutes or less' under the cooking time options.
steps.4: Click on the first recipe that appears in the filtered results.

task: Search for a vegetarian pasta recipe on Allrecipes that serves 4 people and can be prepared in under 40 minutes.

steps.2: Locate the search bar at the top of the page.
steps.3: Type 'vegetarian pasta recipe' into the search bar.
steps.4: Press the 'Enter' key to initiate the search.
steps.5: Use the filter options to select 'Servings: 4'.
steps.6: Use the filter options to set 'Preparation time: 40 minutes or less'.
steps.7: Review the search results to find suitable recipes.

task: Search for wireless earbuds priced between $50 and $150 on Amazon. Then identify one of these wireless earbuds that has at least 15,000 reviews and a rating higher than 4 stars.

steps.1: Go to the search bar on the Amazon homepage.
steps.3: Use the filter options to set the price range between $50 and $150.
steps.4: Scroll through the results to find earbuds with at least 15,000 reviews and a rating greater than 4 stars.

task: Find a set of wireless earbuds with noise cancellation features and a customer rating of at least 4 stars on Amazon.

steps.2: Locate the search bar at the top of the page.
steps.3: Type 'wireless earbuds with noise cancellation' into the search bar.
steps.4: Press the 'Enter' key to initiate the search.
steps.5: Filter the search results by selecting the rating filter for '4 stars & up'.
steps.6: Scroll through the list of results to find suitable earbuds.
steps.7: Hover over product images to view quick details.
steps.8: Click on a product to view more information.

steps.3: Scroll through the available iPhone models and note the prices and color options.

task: Find the specifications and price details of the latest MacBook Pro model on Apple

steps.1: Click on 'Mac' tab in the top menu bar
